level.heading: PRIZE STRUCTURE FOR THE D.C. QUICK CASH GAME (ยง 30-912)

level.text: The D.C. QUICK CASH game is a fixed payout game which pays prizes based on a one dollar ($1) bet as follows:
All six winning numbers on a single lettered game board shall entitle a winner to the first prize of two hundred and fifty thousand dollars ($250,000);
Any five winning numbers on a single lettered game board shall entitle a winner to a second prize of one thousand dollars ($1,000); or
Any four winning numbers on a single lettered game board shall entitle a winner to the third prize of ten dollars ($10).
